comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool. This contract includes one or more amendments. Consultant to conduct the following tasks at the Pickering Lands Sites located in Pickering, Ontario: a background document. records review, groundwater monitoring and sampling, qualitative inspection of the confined disposal area, preparation of a remedial. risk management plan, update of National Classification System for Contaminated Sites score, and completion of the site closure tool to extent possible.
